channel.title: [317/Delta] Double Xp
channel.description: Ok so I recently made it to where character-doublexp is in all the char files and will go in all the new ones now all I need to know how to do is make it to where if (doublexp > 0), the person gets twice the xp for every skill. I'm assuming you'd have to do an if with the playerlevels before that but i'm not intirly sure. Help if you can!

item.title: [317/Delta] Double Xp
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:2, topic:350650"]Ill look into it for you… Also are you still gonna host camelot-pvp revived? Cause it’s ready for you 2 download

Heres all you have to do, If you need it done a different way if this wont work for what your using it for (I already tested it it gives double xp) Ill make a new one for you.

Open up client.java and search for this boolean addskillxp and under this (yours may not look 100% like this) public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) { if (expLock) return false; if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || amount + playerXP[skill] > 200000000 || playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { playerXP[skill] = 200000000; refreshSkills(); return false; }
add this if(doublexp > 0) { amount *= 2; }

That will double the xp for everying. :)[/quote]
Rep++ man this is perfect, Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [317/Delta] Double Xp
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Ill look into it for you… Also are you still gonna host camelot-pvp revived? Cause it’s ready for you 2 download

Heres all you have to do, If you need it done a different way if this wont work for what your using it for (I already tested it it gives double xp) Ill make a new one for you.

Open up client.java and search for this boolean addskillxp and under this (yours may not look 100% like this) public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) { if (expLock) return false; if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || amount + playerXP[skill] > 200000000 || playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { playerXP[skill] = 200000000; refreshSkills(); return false; }
add this if(doublexp > 0) { amount *= 2; }

That will double the xp for everying.
